Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.permission

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DynamicPermissionsView.PermissionListener
    Interface to provide callback when a permission is selected.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DynamicPermission
    A model class to hold the permission details that will be used by the app.
    DynamicPermissions
    Help class to request and manage runtime permissions introduced in Android M.
    DynamicPermissionsActivity
    Base activity to request the DynamicPermission.
    DynamicPermissionsAdapter
    A RecyclerView.Adapter to show the DynamicPermissions.
    DynamicPermissionsAdapter.ViewHolder
    View holder to hold the permission layout.
    DynamicPermissionsFragment
    Base fragment class to show a list of required permissions in a recycler view.
    DynamicPermissionsView
    A FrameLayout containing a RecyclerView to show the list of required permissions.
    DynamicPermissionUtils
    Helper class to work with permissions and DynamicPermission.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    DynamicPermissionsAction
    Interface to hold the permissions action which will be called when all the permissions are granted.
